content: पूति {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पूय्-क्तिच्] Putrid, stinking, fetid, foul-smelling; <ls>Bg. 17. 10.</ls> --तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [पू-पूष् वा भावे क्तिन्] {@--1@} Purification. {@--2@} Stink, stench. {@--3@} Putrefaction. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} Filthy water. {@--2@} Pus, matter. {@--3@} The substance called civet.
